name: RetroBot
description: RetroBot is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is a proud member of the WebtrES club. With its classic box design and retro console buttons, RetroBot stands out among its robotic peers. Its arms and legs are built in a classic style, reminiscent of older technology. The screen of RetroBot features a vintage display, adding to its nostalgic charm. RetroBot possesses a unique blend of old-fashioned aesthetics and modern functionality, making it a beloved member of the WebtrES club.
